entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as a person who has been unfair to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being discussed by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is sitting next to Harry and helping herself to shepherd's pie.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who has a mutual enmity with Harry.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as someone whose potion shattered and set his robes on fire.

relationships.description: Snape and Harry have an absolute mutual enmity from the moment Harry had set foot in Hogwarts.
Hermione is disappointed that Snape might not be better this year.
Harry's potion is compared to Goyle's, which shattered and set his robes on fire.
Snape is now a member of the Order.
